note.p: Medical assistant and medical student. Assistant at the time of his death to Dr Shackelton of Poplar, London. Married Ellen Denham in Hackney, 1871. Died as a result of taking prussic acid. Collected moths.
Census returns of England and Wales 1891 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG12/135/6/5)
letter from H. B. Smyth, 15 January 1876
London, England, marriages & banns 1754–1921 (Ancestry.com, accessed 27 January 2016)
